article.headline: Elon University 68, Western Carolina 53
article.story: ELON, N.C. (AP) -- Matt Nowlin scored 20 points and Jackson Atoyebi had 16 points and 13 rebounds to lead Elon to a 68-53 win Saturday over Western Carolina. Scottie Jackson added 11 points for the Phoenix (9-16, 5-8 Southern Conference), who lost to Western Carolina 81-72 in their last meeting Jan. 10. Alex Osipovitch scored 13 points, Kevin Martin had 12 and David Berghoefter 11 for the Catamounts (12-12, 5-8). Elon, shooting 56.5 percent to Western Carolina's 30 percent from the field in the first half, ran up a 34-23 lead by the break and never trailed in the game.
